full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL LDAN LHA MO'I SGO NAS BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS S+HO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI CHE BA JANG JONG CHE DBANG GI DGE BSKOS TZAS SANG NANG SO CHOS 'PHEL ZHES BYA NAS, THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO'I MDZAD PA BZLOG SGYUR SHIN TU BSDUS PA'I PHYIR, DE LA RGYAS PA ZHES BGYIS ZHES BSKUL BA MNGA' DAG SOL MA LTOG BAR, DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA'I THA SHAL BA BYUNG RGYAL DU SONG BA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS BGYIS PA'I NYAMS TSOGS KUN LHA MO 'KHOR DANG BCAS BYAMS SHING BZOD GSOL, 'ONG KYANG GANG BGYIS PA KUN LA PHAN DANG BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL BAR GYUR CIG ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
